_meanings:
{@--1@} ({%a%}) To press
down or against, hurt, injure, pain;
{#stanopapIqaM parirabDukAmA#} <ls>Ki. 3. 54</ls>,
<ls n="Ki.">8. 16</ls>; <ls>Śi. 10. 47</ls>; {#pArSvopapIqaM#}, 
{#pArSvayorupapIqaM, pArSvAByAmupapIqaM#} <ls>Sk.</ls> ({%b%}) To 
oppress, devastate, lay waste;  
{#kzuttfzRopapIqita#} troubled; <ls>Ms. 8. 67</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8."></ls> 
<ls n="Ms.">7. 195</ls>; <ls>Kām. 8. 72.</ls>
